title: One day you will proud of yourself for never giving up. Can you evaluate this Statement with an incident? - Quora

response.answer_text: At one time I had no car and had to take the bus to get home. I was almost raped by a group of boys, but escaped, thank God. It took me many years to earn my degrees, as I also had to work full time, and go to school nights summers and week ends. My parents were very poor. But I never gave up!
